languages.text: "Закон един для всех, Вольный Торговец. Даже для вас, даже на краю галактики. Арбитры, к бою!"
"The law is the same for everyone, Rogue Trader — even for you, and even on the edge of the galaxy. Arbitrators, to arms!"
languages.original_text: "Закон един для всех, Вольный Торговец. Даже для вас, даже на краю галактики. Арбитры, к бою!"

traits.locale_text: "The law is the same for everyone, Rogue Trader. Even for you, and even on the edge of the galaxy. Arbitrators, to arms!"
"The law is the same for everyone, Rogue Trader. Even for you, and even on the edge of the galaxy. Arbitrators, to arms!"
"The law is the same for everyone, Rogue Trader — even for you, and even on the edge of the galaxy. Arbitrators, to arms!"

"The law is the same for everyone, Rogue Trader — even for you, and even on the edge of the galaxy. Arbitrators, to arms!"

languages.text: «La ley es la misma para todos, Comerciante, incluso para usted e incluso en el filo de la galaxia. ¡Arbitrator, a las armas!».
languages.original_text: "The law is the same for everyone, Rogue Trader — even for you, and even on the edge of the galaxy. Arbitrators, to arms!"

traits.locale_text: «La ley es la misma para todos, Comerciante, incluso para usted e incluso en el filo de la galaxia. ¡Arbitrator, a las armas!».

languages.text: “法律面前人人平等，即便这里是银河系边缘也不例外，即便对方是行商浪人也不例外。所有法务官，拿起武器！”
languages.original_text: "The law is the same for everyone, Rogue Trader — even for you, and even on the edge of the galaxy. Arbitrators, to arms!"

traits.locale_text: “法律面前人人平等，即便这里是银河系边缘也不例外，即便对方是行商浪人也不例外。所有法务官，拿起武器！”

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダー、法は皆にとって同じです―たとえあなたであっても、たとえ銀河の端であっても。アービトレイター、武器を構えろ！」
languages.original_text: "The law is the same for everyone, Rogue Trader — even for you, and even on the edge of the galaxy. Arbitrators, to arms!"

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダー、法は皆にとって同じです―たとえあなたであっても、たとえ銀河の端であっても。アービトレイター、武器を構えろ！」

languages.text: « La loi est la même pour tout le monde, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, y compris aux confins de la galaxie, et vous ne faites pas exception à la règle. Arbitrators, aux armes ! »
languages.original_text: "The law is the same for everyone, Rogue Trader — even for you, and even on the edge of the galaxy. Arbitrators, to arms!"

traits.locale_text: « La loi est la même pour tout le monde, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, y compris aux confins de la galaxie, et vous ne faites pas exception à la règle. Arbitrators, aux armes ! »

languages.text: "Kanun herkes için aynı işler Hür Tacir. Sizin için de öyle, galaksinin en uç noktasında olsanız bile öyle. Yargıcılar, silahlar!"
languages.original_text: "The law is the same for everyone, Rogue Trader — even for you, and even on the edge of the galaxy. Arbitrators, to arms!"

traits.locale_text: "Kanun herkes için aynı işler Hür Tacir. Sizin için de öyle, galaksinin en uç noktasında olsanız bile öyle. Yargıcılar, silahlar!"

languages.text: "Die Gesetze sind für alle gleich, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} ... Sie gelten auch für Euch, selbst am Rand der Galaxis. Arbitratoren, an die Waffen!"
languages.original_text: "The law is the same for everyone, Rogue Trader — even for you, and even on the edge of the galaxy. Arbitrators, to arms!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Gesetze sind für alle gleich, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} ... Sie gelten auch für Euch, selbst am Rand der Galaxis. Arbitratoren, an die Waffen!"
